partintro.para: This is the external API for applications to use.
The API is relatively lean and designed to have close analogies to the USB specification.

chapter.title: Timeouts
chapter.para: Timeout's are always specified in milliseconds.

chapter.title: Data Types
chapter.para: Openusb tries to use standard C types wherever possible to avoid complicating things. Where standard C types are insufficient, libopenusb uses abstracted types to ensure portability and forward compatibility.
